titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on lambdacyhalothrin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on 1a(S),3a(Z))-(+)-cyano-(3-phenoxyphenyl)-methyl 3-(2-chloro-3, 3,3-trifluoro-1-propenyl)-2,2-dimethylcyclopropanecarboxylate (also known as lambdacyhalothrin).
